title: Ra Ra Ramaiya Lyrics Baasha
stanzas:
Ra Ra Ramaiya Song Lyrics Baasha
#SPB #Deva #Vairamuthu

Orey oru Chandhiranthaan
iravukellam.
orey oru sooriyanthaan
pagazhukellaam

orey oru baashaa thaan
indha oorukellaam(3)

Ra Ra ramaiya
ettu kulla ulagam
irukku ramaiyaa

ada Ra Ra ramaiya
naan puttu puttu
vaikkaporen paraiyaa

ettu kulla vazhka
irukku ramiya(2)
buthikku ettumpadi
sollaporen kelaiyaa

ikkada Ra Ra ramaiya
ettu kulla ulagam
irukku ramaiyaa

ada Ra Ra ramaiya
naan puttu puttu
vaikkaporen paraiyaa

mudhal ettil aadaathadhu
vilaiyaatalla.
nee rendaam ettil
kallaaladhu kalviyum alla(2)

moondraa ettil seiyaathadhu
thirumanam alla.
nee naalaam ettil perathadhu
kuzhandhaiyum alla

ettu ettaa manushan
vazhva prichiko(2)
nee endha ettil
ipppa irukka nenachiko

Ra Ra ramaiya
ettu kulla ulagam
irukku ramaiyaa

ada Ra Ra ramaiya
naan puttu puttu
vaikkaporen paraiyaa

aindhaam ettil serkaathadhu
selvamum alla.
nee aaram ettil sutraathadhu
ulagamum alla.(2)

ezhaam ettil kaanaathadhu
oivum illa.
nee ettaam ettukku maela
irundha nimmadhi illa

ettu ettaa manushan
vazhva prichiko(2)
nee endha ettil
ipppa irukka nenachiko

Ra Ra ramaiya
ettu kulla ulagam
irukku ramaiyaa

ada Ra Ra ramaiya
naan puttu puttu
vaikkaporen paraiyaa

ettu kulla vazhka
irukku ramiya(2)
buthikku ettumpadi
sollaporen kelaiyaa

Ra Ra ramaiya
ettu kulla ulagam
irukku ramaiyaa

ada Ra Ra ramaiya
naan puttu puttu
vaikkaporen paraiyaa
